results.text: PSYCH! Re-roll on the chart with [[1D20+1D10]] any result over 20 goes to 20.

THOU NEEDETH A WET-NURSE!: The sheer sight of the Cosmic Barbarian’s muscles is enough to make the fiend flee in fear! Attack deals normal damage +3. If the enemy survives, they run away from the battle.

FLYING ELBOW DROP: The attack knocks the enemy @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.Ub7F3RDnX9gdMr8O]{Prone}, then the Cosmic Barbarian drops an elbow onto the fallen foe, dealing an additional [[1D4+2]] damage.
DESTINED TO BE BEATEN! This mighty blow to your foe adds [[1D6]] additional damage.
DIALED IN: Perfect strike hits the foe’s weak points, dealing an additional [[1D8]] damage.
TOTALLY AMPED! Hyped on battle, the Cosmic Barbarian deals an additional [[1D10]] damage out of pure excitement.
Strength in battle outweighs skill in this situation, adding your Burliness S.T.A.T.S. score to the damage.

CONTACT HIGH: When the attack hits, some cosmic dust makes its way into the foe’s eyes, causing them to roll on the @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.tables.RollTable.BIDFFaLxG6ywrUF8]{Drug Effects} Table with a 1D6. (Attack deals normal damage).
THOU ART NO MATCH! Everyone is weak compared to the Cosmic Barbarian! Add an additional [[2D6]] damage.
DRUG-INDUCED BLOODLUST! Pay 1 Cosmic Point per additional [[/roll 1D4]] damage!
TWINSANITY!: The cosmic dust manifests into a second Cosmic Barbarian, and he acts and attacks separately from the real one for [[1D3]] turns.
BOOMING HEAVENS ROAR: Lord Randy favors the bold and grants double damage for the attack.

CELESTIAL AID: A prismatic cosmic beam illuminates the Cosmic Barbarian’s weapon, granting them @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.7xLTy155T0Y6m0zl]{Dazzling} damage for [[1D3]] turns, dealing normal damage.

I LIVE TO GET RADICAL: Attack deals normal damage. The adrenaline rush from the body count gives the Cosmic Barbarian the ability to ignore the cool down for snorting cosmic dust for [[1D6]] turns. AGer the turn or combat has ended, the Cosmic Barbarian takes [[1D4]] damage and gets a nosebleed.

RAINBOW RECKONING! A beam of light in the form of a rainbow bursts forth from the Cosmic Barbarian’s weapons, hitting the target for normal damage plus [[2D6]] @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.9skDCk49uq5QjTMT]{Spillover} damage.
KLATHU’S REVENGE: the patriarch smiles on his follower, granting the attack 3x damage.

A resounding “Ooooooooooooooooohhhhhhhhh Yeeeeeahhhhh!” fiunders forth as your colossal strike hits your foe as intended, shattering every bone in their face, dealing an additional [[1D12]] damage. They are left in the dust to contemplate why they would step up to such an adversary. There is a faint smell of beef jerky in the air.

LET THE COSMOS ECHO THY FURY! The attack gains @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.9skDCk49uq5QjTMT]{Spillover} damage and an additional [[3D6x6]] damage.
LORD OF THE SAVAGE!: A frenzy of attacks beyond the speed of any mortal man. Roll damage 4 times.

COSMIC WAVES OF INSANITY: A cosmic shift in the aether causes the Cosmic Barbarian to enter a frenzy, taking their Brains S.T.A.T.S. down to 1. The remainder of the points become a bonus modifier to attack and damage until the next long rest.
